title: LEC Education
description: I designed and developed wordpress theme for a local business to create a better online presence and increase sign-ups for there business.
challenges: I was tasked to establish a modern website that increased brand awareness and attracted new customers by increasing sign-ups. I started by doing brand research and developing the style guide using the existing logo. After that created a wireframe for the client. I started the development process using Bootstrap and wordpress I started creating the theme using Underscores Wordpress starter theme to hit the ground running
features: Worked with a local client to deliver a modern and responsive Wordpress theme
Created a events page that can be customised by the client
Created an Image montage using the filckr API to get images
